SEARCH
Package com.hexaware.payxpert.model

Class Payroll

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.payxpert.model.Payroll
public class Payroll extends Object
The Payroll class represents the payroll information for an employee during a specific pay period. It contains details such as payroll ID, employee ID, pay period start and end dates, basic salary, overtime pay, other pay, deductions, gross salary, tax amount, and net salary.

  • Constructor Details

    • Payroll

      public Payroll()
      Default constructor for the Payroll class.

    • Payroll

      public Payroll(int payrollID, int employeeID, Date payPeriodStartDate, Date payPeriodEndDate, double basicSalary, double overtimePay, double otherPay, double deductions, double grossSalary, double taxAmount, double netSalary)
      Parameterized constructor to create a Payroll with specific details.
      Parameters:
      payrollID - The unique identifier for the payroll.
      employeeID - The unique identifier for the associated employee.
      payPeriodStartDate - The start date of the pay period.
      payPeriodEndDate - The end date of the pay period.
      basicSalary - The basic salary for the employee.
      overtimePay - The overtime pay for the employee.
      otherPay - Other additional pay for the employee.
      deductions - Deductions from the salary.
      grossSalary - The gross salary before deductions.
      taxAmount - The amount of tax deducted.
      netSalary - The net salary after deductions and taxes.
